modName: PREVIEW Ultra Perfect Skyrim and Overhaul Version II - UPSO II - FR and ENG
summary:
COMING SOON! The version 2.1 of UPSO (Ultra Perfect Skyrim and Overhaul)
More than 25Go of mods! More than 250 to install with UPSO v2.1 in ENGLISH and FRENCH
descriptionHtml:
COMING SOON! The version 2.1 of UPSO (Ultra Perfect Skyrim and Overhaul)
More than 25Go of mods! More than 250 mods to install with UPSO v2.1 in ENGLISH and FRENCH

New gameplay, new creatures, more immersive, new armors, new weapons, full HD, ... and so many things!

In download: The video of the first preview of UPSO v2.1! And the annoucement date for UPSO v2.1!!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[url=http://lapassiondumangaselonjinfuushen.over-blog.com/article-date-of-u-p-s-o-version-2-1---ultra-perfect-and-overhaul-skyrim---video-games-117998945.html]A DATE FOR UPSO v2.1 ![/url]
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Sorry for my english, it\'s just a translate!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Hello everybody, I\'m Jinfuushen

I decided to create an alternative in French and English to increase the game with the UPSO v2.1 released during May, an opportunity for me to share with you for now the results of my work, inviting you in first to discover the image gallery of UPSO v2.1 by going here (The two preview are in french, but the UPSO will be in English too, dont\' worry):

[url=http://lapassiondumangaselonjinfuushen.over-blog.com/article-la-galerie-u-p-s-o-jeux-videos-117449527.html]UPSO v2.1 Preview[/url]

And discover other hand, a panoramic view video:
[url=http://lapassiondumangaselonjinfuushen.over-blog.com/article-preview-2-upso-v2-1-la-galerie-u-p-s-o-jeux-videos-117662495.html]UPSO v2.1 PREVIEW 2[/url]

I hope this has at least arrested at the graphics rendering.

Excerpt from the introduction to the installation of UPSO:

\"[...] it is not necessarily easy modding a game, what to choose from an astronomical ideas from around the world amount. Being myself \"modder\" and having run my hump in Skyrim and Tamriel, I had the opportunity to test a lot of mods with varying degrees of success. For it must be said, install a mod and change a game, inevitably involves become unstable, the game is optimized initially for a certain number of things, but certainly not to take in the face more than 20GB of files additives. Sometimes this causes some of headaches because all the mods are not necessarily compatible with each other, your PC may not be able to support a big slap. You are now for hours and hours looking for what mod should be removed, which is worth more than another, and so on. A \"great loss\" of time if you will.

You\'ll understand that what follows is the shortest way to reach a perfect SKYRIM, while the Ultra HD, alternating 2k and 4k textures, with a completely redesigned gaming experience as much more precise and demanding. It is further to be noted that the following mods and installation guide that follow must be followed to the letter ready, so to achieve a spectacular result simply stunning and striking \"realism\".\"



The release of the manual of installation UPSO version 2.1 is coming soon, in the meantime, I also would put a video online in-game!
author: jinfuushen
